verses.verse: How lovely <WH3039> are your dwellings, <WH4908> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies! <WH6635>
My soul <WH5315> longs, <WH3700> and even faints <WH3615> for the courts <WH2691> of Yahweh. <WH3068> My heart <WH3820> and my flesh <WH1320> cry out <WH7442> for the living <WH2416> God. <WH410>

Yes, <WH6833> the sparrow has found <WH4672> a home, <WH1004> and the swallow <WH1866> a nest <WH7064> for herself, <WH7896> where she may have her young, <WH667> near your altars, <WH4196> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies, <WH6635> my King, <WH4428> and my God. <WH430>
Blessed <WH835> are those who dwell <WH3427> in your house. <WH1004> They are always praising <WH1984> you. <WH5542> Selah.
Blessed <WH835> are those <WH120> whose strength <WH5797> is in you; <WH3824> who have set their hearts on a pilgrimage. <WH4546>
Passing <WH5674> through the valley <WH6010> of Weeping, <WH1056> they make <WH7896> it a place of springs. <WH4599> Yes, <WH4175> the autumn rain covers <WH5844> it with blessings. <WH1293>
They go <WH3212> from strength <WH2428> to strength. <WH2428> Everyone of them appears <WH7200> before God <WH430> in Zion. <WH6726>
Yahweh, <WH3068> God <WH430> of Armies, <WH6635> hear <WH8085> my prayer. <WH8605> Listen, <WH8085> God <WH430> of Jacob. <WH3290> Selah. <WH5542>
Behold, <WH7200> God <WH430> our shield, <WH4043> look <WH5027> at the face <WH6440> of your anointed. <WH4899>

For a day <WH3117> in your courts <WH2691> is better <WH2896> than a thousand. <WH505> I would rather <WH977> be a doorkeeper <WH5605> in the house <WH1004> of my God, <WH430> than to dwell <WH1752> in the tents <WH168> of wickedness. <WH7562>

For Yahweh <WH3068> God <WH430> is a sun <WH8121> and a shield. <WH4043> Yahweh <WH3068> will give <WH5414> grace <WH2580> and glory. <WH3519> He withholds <WH4513> no good <WH2896> thing from those who walk <WH1980> blamelessly. <WH8549>
Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies, <WH6635> blessed <WH835> is the man <WH120> who trusts in you. <WH982>
